all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And he that is a faithful and wise steward shall inherit all things. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 78:22
Quote of the Day
"As we turn to Jesus Christ, the Savior of the world, He rescues us from the storms of life through His Atonement."
Elder Quentin L. Cook | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
